department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: The course is an introductory subject on electromagnetics, emphasizing fundamental concepts and applications of Maxwell equations.
goal.ch: The course is an introductory subject on electromagnetics, emphasizing fundamental concepts and applications of Maxwell equations.

content.en:
1. magnetostatics
2. magnetic fields in matter
3. electrodynamics
4. conservation laws
5. electromagnetic waves
content.ch:
1. magnetostatics
2. magnetic fields in matter
3. electrodynamics
4. conservation laws
5. electromagnetic waves

en.competency: Integration of innovation and critical thinking

ch.competency: 日地系統觀測技術的培養
